biography.bio: Dominic Raacke was born on December 11, 1958 in Hanau, Hesse, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Tatort (1970), Passion (2012) and EuroTrip (2004).
biography.name: Dominic Raacke

biography.bio: Sophie von Kessel was born on October 12, 1968 in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico. She is an actress, known for Tarragone, du paradis à l'enfer (2007), Zwei Weihnachtsmänner (2008) and Amerika (1996).
biography.name: Sophie von Kessel

biography.bio: Uwe Ochsenknecht was born on January 7, 1956 in Biblis, Hesse, Germany as Uwe Adam Ochsenknecht. He is an actor, known for Das Boot (1981), Schtonk (1992) and Illumination garantie (1999). He was previously married to Natascha Ochsenknecht.
biography.name: Uwe Ochsenknecht

biography.bio: Johanna Gastdorf was born in 1959 in Hamburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Sophie Scholl: The Final Days (2005), Le miracle de Berne (2003) and The Wave (2008). She is married to Jan-Gregor Kremp. They have one child.
biography.name: Johanna Gastdorf

biography.bio: Florian Weber was born in 1976. He is an actor, known for Das Duell im Ersten (2009), Meister des Alltags (2012) and Wer hat's gesehen? (2000).
biography.name: Florian Weber

biography.bio: Timo Dierkes was born on June 10, 1967 in Ibbenbüren, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is known for his work on Le transporteur 3 (2008), The Experiment (2001) and Heldt (2013).
biography.name: Timo Dierkes

biography.bio: Louise Ehrlich is an actress, known for Le châtiment du Makhila (2001), Changement de cap (1998) and Diggity's Treasure (2001).
biography.name: Louise Ehrlich

biography.bio: Heinrich Giskes was born on April 3, 1946 in Krefeld, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Bang Boom Bang - Ein todsicheres Ding (1999), Tous les moyens sont bons (1993) and Heinrich (1977).
biography.name: Heinrich Giskes

biography.bio: Anna Grisebach was born on March 20, 1974 in Göttingen, Lower Saxony, Germany. She is an actress, known for Bright Night (2014), Koslowski & Haferkamp (2014) and Der blinde Fleck (2013).
biography.name: Anna Grisebach

biography.bio: Mechthild Großmann was born on December 23, 1948 in Münster, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Nowhere in Africa (2001), Tatort (1970) and Seduction: The Cruel Woman (1985). She is married to Stephan Meyer. They have one child.
biography.name: Mechthild Großmann

biography.bio: Josef Hannesschläger was born on June 2, 1962 in Munich, Germany. He is an actor, known for Die Rosenheim-Cops (2002), Qui peut sauver le Far West? (2001) and Tuez-moi d'abord (1995).
biography.name: Josef Hannesschläger

biography.bio: Ralf Huettner was born on November 29, 1954 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. He is a director and writer, known for Vincent Wants to Sea (2010), Die Musterknaben (1997) and Mondscheintarif (2001).
biography.name: Ralf Huettner

biography.bio: Eva Kinsky was born on June 28, 1945 in Vienna, Austria. She was an actress, known for Das kleine Gespenst (1992), Testament (1968) and Der Finger im Revolverlauf (1985). She died on February 2, 2000 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Eva Kinsky

biography.bio: Ulrike Kriener was born on December 24, 1954 in Bottrop, Germany. She is an actress, known for Kommissarin Lucas (2003), Men... (1985) and Reise in die Nacht (1998). She has been married to Georg Weber since 1992. They have two children.
biography.name: Ulrike Kriener

biography.bio: Dominique Lorenz was born in 1966 in Munich, Germany. She is an actress and writer, known for Einmal Leben bitte (2013), Himmlische Helden (2001) and Wer hat Angst vorm weißen Mann? (2013). She was previously married to Philipp Brammer.
biography.name: Dominique Lorenz
